files.title: List UI hint examples
files.subtitle: Questions that use the `list` uiHint
files.detail: The steps included in this task are all examples of ChoiceQuestion objects that use the `ListItem` UIHint.

files.title: Textfield UI hint examples
files.subtitle: SkipCheckboxQuestion objects where the input items are entered with a text field.
files.detail: The steps included in this task are all examples of KeyboardTextInputItem objects that use a text field.
